word: "Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God" [1 John 3:1]. We cannot find words to express the love of God, but He calls upon us to behold it. "For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in Him should not perish, but have everlasting life." "As Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness, even so must the Son of man be lifted up" [John 3:14].
